name: 2024 8th International Conference on Advances in Image Processing
content: Proceedings: The accepted (Registered & Presented) full papers will be included to be published in the International Conference Proceedings by ACM ( ISBN: 979-8-4007-1750-5), which will be submitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
organizers: Sichuan University, Southwest University of Finance and Economics
